creator: christophe.jaillet@wanadoo.fr
text:
Created attachment 29428
Proposed patch

The URLs given in the doc do not match the configuration example.

The proposed patch updates the URLs.
s/etat-serveur/server-status/


I think that keeping server-status is better than having etat-server in the URL. I don't see any point in translating such a thing.

Best regards.

creator: lucien.gentis@medecine.uhp-nancy.fr
text:
Thanks for your comment.

In fact, I modified the configuration example.
